channel.title: unable to upload to new images to the wiki
channel.description:
Im trying to upload new images to the wiki with this section:
https://www.whonix.org/w/index.php?title=Dev/ImageResize&action=edit
but it says that i dont have permission to create new section. But i dont want to create new section just want to upload new images.
Any idea how to solve this?
cc @Patrick @torjunkie @0brand

item.description:
Thank you for this post.

item.title: unable to upload to new images to the wiki
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: unable to upload to new images to the wiki

item.title: unable to upload to new images to the wiki
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I should not have moved to https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Template:ImageResize1. But the idea was also not to click the link to https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Template:ImageResize1. That only kept to keep the existing images. Remember, that page was split to reduce loading times when adding new images.

(moved to) No need to go to https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/ImageResize2,

Please add new images to https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/ImageResize. Similar like you did before.

Does that work?

Also a mediawiki upgrade (required for security) might be the cause for this.

Read full topic
item.source: unable to upload to new images to the wiki

item.title: unable to upload to new images to the wiki
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi TNT_BOM_BOM

Looks like https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/ImageResize was moved to https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Template:ImageResize1. It think that might be the issue.

See page history:

https://www.whonix.org/w/index.php?title=Dev/ImageResize&action=history
